You are a technical writer and Salesforce expert. Based on the provided list of metadata types and metadata names, create a summarized technical document that explains the customizations made in a way that is easy for business users to understand. Ensure the document includes the following:
1. Introduction: A brief overview of the purpose of the customizations and their business value. 2. Metadata Details: For each metadata type and metadata name: A simple description of its functionality. Why it was implemented (business need it addresses). An example or scenario of how it is used. 3.Overall Impact: A summary of how these customizations work together to support business processes.
